text: btg is the largest Investment Bank Latin
America that is now expanding its
services throughout the world we wanted
to expand our B2B products to to end
customers so we we wanted to build
something that was fast scalable and
resilient btg chose to create its first
Investment app for end customers in AWS
it was a simple architecture easy toos
running some web Logics in Oracle R's
and we also use some load balancers ARA
helped us a lot with the shift left
solution with this we can block
vulnerabilities before they even go to
to our environment the Orca integration
with ticketing Solutions such as jira
helped us a lot with the sock team now
they have some alerts that they
automatically um resolve we chose Ora
over other tws because their approach to
Cloud security is way different from the
other ones also it's
more cost effective for us because we
have a huge environment and a lot of
solutions with worka we were able
to reduce our detection and response
time by 30% especially using the oras AI
search engine that's powered by Amazon
bedrock
[Music]
